title: Give me one good reason this person should not be immediately permabanned.

replies.body:
nah, i dont believe it, its chopped up. give us full list, not choppy
 
Sometimes i will intentionally feed without making it obvious, because of the fact people flame me too hard, so i dont mind losing just to make them lose lp, ill climb. i honestly will. but it makes them tilt into next game.

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-23T14:52:55.791+0000)
>
> nah, i dont believe it, its chopped up. give us full list, not choppy
>  
> Sometimes i will intentionally feed without making it obvious, because of the fact people flame me too hard, so i dont mind losing just to make them lose lp, ill climb. i honestly will. but it makes them tilt into next game.

Give me one reason you shouldn't be permabanned?

because ally team bans your main, and they see it

So in return they get the janna mid/top and i cs hard.

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T16:54:01.973+0000)
>
> because ally team bans your main, and they see it
> 
> So in return they get the janna mid/top and i cs hard.

so you're toxic and force people who DIDN'T ban your champ to lose? Honestly, hope you get perma'd so I don't ever have to play with children like you. Keep posting from that lvl 20 smurf brotha
You act like that makes it okay...
Don't bother feed the troll cos he's obviously is one.
lululululu
Before getting too cocky with your smurf, just telling you in advance: They can IP ban, or at least effortlessly find out which account at your IP is your main.
TYLER1
Lol ignore these kids, I had 5 accounts banned from the same IP. Still play with that IP perfectly fine.
Think hes done lvling TYLER2 yet?

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T19:01:09.472+0000)
>
> you sir, are a retard. What i said is... ON MY TEAM ... do you understand so far? When i show that i have a champion that i MAIN shown.... AND THEY BAN IT ON MY SIDE...... they get janna mid/top. Do you understand?

I mean, I understand. But only
One person on your team that did that. There is 3 other people you are ruining the game for. I understand that you're toxic but there is no reason for the R word
this isnt twitch tv.

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-24T00:59:52.103+0000)
>
> this isnt twitch tv.

What does that have to do with anything?
There isn't really a way to deal with one person in-game. You have to take the hit, and there's not much u can do outside of that.
oh look another reason for you to be banned
waiting. lmao!

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-23T20:00:57.277+0000)
>
> waiting. lmao!

yeah, just keep laughing when you get banned you gonna go crying back to mommy
next we see is another " WTF PERMABANNED RITO FIX PLS" in player behavior and moderation
Keep doing whatever you are doing. Sooner or later when perma-ban hit ya. Don't even try coming back to the board and start crying over it.
lol!!! ooo not hard to make another account xD hahaha
It's not hard for RIOT to track down any of your known associated accounts then permaban them over again.

That is not what Riot does though. They don't ban IPs except for very rare cases. 

It's kind of a bummer for a lot of the community, but I understand why they don't.
Which they don't do unless you become a problem to the entire community (see XJ9, Tyler1)
You will climb? Please...don't make us laugh. With the toxicity and immature behavior, you will never climb. People like you are the reason why the community hated the most.
lul G1 in my first season, placed S5 this season and at S2. id say thats climbing right back up to Gold hmmmm
yeah im challenger on my main too. just don't want to post on it cuz people might know the real rank... o.O
first up, boards are about 98% made up of bronze-plats, thats not realistic and stop trying to get my information. lmao
I don't recall asking you lmao. Good try though. Stay free :)
hmmmm not asking, just pointing out. feelsbadman to know your lying about challenger {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Lol. you won't know just like everyone on here won't know if you're lying about your "main"
im 100% confident.... wait. lmao plat 5 51 lp. yeah, really challenger arent you bud?

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=000100040000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-24T15:47:17.898+0000)
>
> im 100% confident.... wait. lmao plat 5 51 lp. yeah, really challenger arent you bud?

Yeah thanks for noticing =) Honestly tho, inting wastes everybody's time and it's childish.
cant argue with that, just as i proved a point, you used a smurf to use boards just like me, so this is the main? nice. well done. i was wrong.
What? No, I don't have a smurf and this is my main account haha. My point is, however, there's no excuse for inting. :(
level 20, can't even rank yet, and you think you're good enough for gold lol. you will get there one day, friend.

Uhh, ditto to you too, Mr. "Level 20 Smurf". Like why do you have to post threads & comments with your smurf  account at Boards instead of your main account? Scared to blind us with your Bronze badge?
already posted saying my main is banned on forums, lmao. so exactly why should i say my main name when it will just get reported?

> [{quoted}](name=The 14th Angel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=000100040000000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-24T15:49:45.179+0000)
>
> already posted saying my main is banned on forums, lmao. so exactly why should i say my main name when it will just get reported?

So you said you would be "waiting" for your account to be banned in the game, while it's already easily banned on the forums.

And you're saying that it's "easy" to buy accounts, where you're lying due to two things:

- It'll get permabanned nonetheless, whether you say it's false or not. Babies can lie better than you.
- This account you're posting in was never updated.

So, quote Apocalypse Meow:

> Honestly, hope you get perma'd so I don't ever have to play with children like you.

I rest my case.

######Inb4 one of your lousy comments you made to others in this thread.

Don't know why you associate toxicity with not being able to climb, you do know there's a much higher ratio of toxic:not toxic players in higher elos right?

Had multiple accounts perma'd for various reasons, not stopping me from getting right back to where i was

There's no way a Vi can be level 17 if she's 1/23/4. There's no way she can have 165 CS if she's died 23 times. How does she have no items if she has that much CS? How can a Jinx die 30 times yet get a kill too all in 25 minutes? Why are the Jinx's items not shown but they are for everyone else? How is she level 10 if she has 9 CS and one kill? How can a Jinx buy Mobi boots and a Talisman of Ascension with zero CS and dying more than once every 60 seconds? I don't see these matches in your match history either so how'd ya even find this player?

Ancient Coin doesn't give the normal GP10 as the other two support items and she can't use its gold income if she's quite literally always dead. It doesn't make sense how she had 3k gold to spend off of passive gold. In that 20 minute match you only get 2,448G from passive gold generation. Assuming she started out with the fully upgraded support item, which isn't possible in the slightest, and assuming she didn't die at all all game and just afk'd to get its full passive effect she would get 1,524G. Together that's 3,972. But again, that's assuming she started the game with an item that costs 2,400G to buy. And assuming she hasn't died for a second and is actively using its passive. And if the boots are first slot, it means she most likely started boots then bought the support item. Which means she's getting even less gold. 

I'unno why you'd lie about this, but tbh none of those pictures make sense. Idk. If they really fed that hard they'll be reported, but it should catch these things instantly.

> [{quoted}](name=Revan Senpai,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-23T15:23:59.099+0000)
>
> There's no way a Vi can be level 17 if she's 1/23/4. There's no way she can have 165 CS if she's died 23 times. How does she have no items if she has that much CS? How can a Jinx die 30 times yet get a kill too all in 25 minutes? Why are the Jinx's items not shown but they are for everyone else? How is she level 10 if she has 9 CS and one kill? How can a Jinx buy Mobi boots and a Talisman of Ascension with zero CS and dying more than once every 60 seconds? I don't see these matches in your match history either so how'd ya even find this player?
> 
> Ancient Coin doesn't give the normal GP10 as the other two support items and she can't use its gold income if she's quite literally always dead. It doesn't make sense how she had 3k gold to spend off of passive gold. In that 20 minute match you only get 2,448G from passive gold generation. Assuming she started out with the fully upgraded support item, which isn't possible in the slightest, and assuming she didn't die at all all game and just afk'd to get its full passive effect she would get 1,524G. Together that's 3,972. But again, that's assuming she started the game with an item that costs 2,400G to buy. And assuming she hasn't died for a second and is actively using its passive. And if the boots are first slot, it means she most likely started boots then bought the support item. Which means she's getting even less gold. 
> 
> I'unno why you'd lie about this, but tbh none of those pictures make sense. Idk. If they really fed that hard they'll be reported, but it should catch these things instantly.

I even tried explaining and attempting to prove without linking directly, but mods removed my post.

I have to crop out so much shit to satisfy anti witch hunting rules.

https://i.gyazo.com/67bcb2ba6d28ffa3ac58996674b7d3ab.png

https://i.gyazo.com/95725901cbe361196400d8c63badd4af.png

There is no good reason why this player hasn't been punished, aside from they haven't shown a long enough history of this behavior
People have bad days, riot understands this.

It sucks when you get a person like this on your team, whose entire goal of a game is to make it impossible to win. Games like this occur rarely and always at times you wish they wouldn't. TBF you had 1 bad game, you'll have 1 good game, where this shit happens to the enemy. IN the long run the 1 loss here will be made up later. Suck to happen, again report move on. 
Open a support ticket if you feel the need to report again

there should never be a "you had a bad day " excuse for inting , same as there shouldnt be "bad day " excuse for hate speech and death threats , you can clearly see she/he/it is inting multiple times over course of few games. The only reason she/he/it is not banned is because the system is not effective enough to punish it. 

We both know it, its not like riot supports inting , or does not care about. Its just their system to detect inters sucks ....

Looking at the match history, I have a feeling it's a shared account...

Between a player who's trying to win and an int feeder
What site are you using for those stats?

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ImUXmFKy,comment-id=000300060002,timestamp=2017-01-24T15:05:46.285+0000)
>
> What site are you using for those stats?

Na.op.gg

Probably not what you want to hear but from what I've seen it takes up to 20 intentional feeding games to be punished. Of course it can be lower than that, it all depends on when they do it. If they're a feeder they'll be punished but if someone decides to go on a "How much can I feed before being banned" binge it could take like 20 games. Luckily this guy at least looks like he's trying in some of his games... which makes no sense to me, but neither does the act of intentional feeding lol.
Well then. Someone did their research..
